name: Notion AI
about: An AI-powered writing assistant built into Notion to help you brainstorm, summarize, and edit ideas quickly.
summary: Boost your productivity with smart writing assistance inside Notion.
details: Notion AI enhances your workflow by writing, summarizing, and brainstorming directly within your workspace. It saves time while keeping your writing clean and structured.
howTo: Open a Notion page and activate Notion AI.
Choose a writing task like 'Summarize' or 'Brainstorm ideas.'
Edit or expand the generated content as needed.
Integrate your final version into your Notion workspace.
